Articles.Content:
This is my first time playing the latest version of KSP, and as i was coming in for a dock, i realized my RCS thrusters failed :/

So i reverted my flight back, and added in batteries and solar panels, yet they still don't work. I of course have them turned on and more than enough fuel. The only addon i have is the kethane mod.

Any ideas?

Had that happen to mine the other day for no reason.

Only suggestion I have is to right click on each one and make sure they're enabled.

Keep in mind, if you're talking about just them operating when you have ASAS turned on, that was all redone this last patch and they aren't as 'active' as they were in previous versions. If you're actually using the thrusters to turn, then you should definitely see them.
just reloaded the same exact rocket, and they are working now. No idea. Thanks for the reply

That's what I was going to suggest. I find that most of the time, once I've ruled out me being stupid (which can take a while) I find that either selecting another craft elsewhere in the game and then coming back, or actually exiting the game and reloading it fixes the problem more often than not.
